results.content: Very bad experience. Most of the topics don't have any pdf's attached. When to talked to Mr.Soni he mentioned udemy is cheap so we don't provide all resources and to see all the content go to bestdotnettraining.com(RS. 3750). I have so much respect for Mr. Soni and was not expecting this thing from him.

results.content: Very good course. The author goes in depth for the various features of WPF by illustrating every feature with examples.
results.content_html: Very good course. The author goes in depth for the various features of WPF by illustrating every feature with examples.

results.content: Tons of details and demonstrations. After only 6 sections (selectively chosen) I am convinced that this course is the best for me to learn WPF (however, I must mention that I have already enough experience with Windows Forms).
results.content_html: Tons of details and demonstrations. After only 6 sections (selectively chosen) I am convinced that this course is the best for me to learn WPF (however, I must mention that I have already enough experience with Windows Forms).

results.content: Great course; very detailed.  Gave me lots of ideas.  I like the repetition because it helped me to learn concepts and syntax.  I don't get a lot of time to work on GUIs so this gets me up to speed quickly where I know what can be done and refer back to exercises when I need to do something.
results.content_html: Great course; very detailed. Gave me lots of ideas. I like the repetition because it helped me to learn concepts and syntax. I don't get a lot of time to work on GUIs so this gets me up to speed quickly where I know what can be done and refer back to exercises when I need to do something.

results.content: Systematically explanation almost every one property and class in WPF. Look no for live project, this is only in-detail, step by step explanation from scratch as always from Soni, I'm satisfied...
results.content_html: Systematically explanation almost every one property and class in WPF. Look no for live project, this is only in-detail, step by step explanation from scratch as always from Soni, I'm satisfied...

results.content: The content is good, but I don't like how there are 30-45 minutes of "blank footage" on most of the lessons. The lessons generally finish at the 10-15 minute mark, but it seems like a 45-60 minute video was uploaded which contributes towards the total hour count which is misleading.
results.content_html: The content is good, but I don't like how there are 30-45 minutes of "blank footage" on most of the lessons. The lessons generally finish at the 10-15 minute mark, but it seems like a 45-60 minute video was uploaded which contributes towards the total hour count which is misleading.

results.content: Yes. However, the questions of first lesson doesn't match exactly with the content presented. There are a lot of questions about base classes that have not been explained in the lesson.
